channel.title: Open Source on Vivek Kumar Singh
channel.description: Recent content in Open Source on Vivek Kumar Singh

item.title: My Open Source Journey With OpenFaaS
item.description: It all started in October 2017, I was actively looking for open source project to contribute when I came to know about Hacktoberfest. It is a month-long celebration of open source software organized by Github and Digital Ocean. While browsing through the Hacktoberfest listed issues, I found an open issue from OpenFaaS. OpenFaaS project is written in Golang. Back then I knew python and had started learning Golang. I thought to give it a try.
